column1: I wish to receive notifications about my:
column2: I wish to receive notifications about my:

column1: Send me text notifications about my order
column2: Send me text notifications about my order

column1:
LINK Mobility SMS Notifications allows your customers to subscribe to transactional text messages regarding their order and receive them on their mobile telephone. Keep your customers engaged by signing up for an account today.

Benefits:

  • Provide your customer with confidence in knowing that they've successfully placed their order
  • Notify your customer once their order has been shipped
  • Instantly alert your customer as soon as you update, refund or cancel their order
column2:
LINK Mobility SMS Notifications allows your customers to subscribe to transactional text messages regarding their order and receive them on their mobile telephone. Keep your customers engaged by signing up for an account today.

Benefits:

  • Provide your customer with confidence in knowing that they've successfully placed their order
  • Notify your customer once their order has been shipped
  • Instantly alert your customer as soon as you update, refund or cancel their order

column1: If "No," "Subscribe to text notifications" checkbox will automatically be checked on customer registration page.
column2: If "No," "Subscribe to text notifications" checkbox will automatically be checked on customer registration page.

column1:
Source format is based on selected Source Type:
  • Short Number: 1-14 digit numeric code (length depends on country, e.g. "12345")
  • Alphanumeric: Up to 11 letters or numbers (A-Z, a-z and 0-9, e.g. "ABC123")
  • Phone number: Mobile number in international format (starting with "+", e.g. "+1-555-555-1234")
column2:
Source format is based on selected Source Type:
  • Short Number: 1-14 digit numeric code (length depends on country, e.g. "12345")
  • Alphanumeric: Up to 11 letters or numbers (A-Z, a-z and 0-9, e.g. "ABC123")
  • Phone number: Mobile number in international format (starting with "+", e.g. "+1-555-555-1234")

column1: Note: We recommend limiting messages to 160 characters or less.
column2: Note: We recommend limiting messages to 160 characters or less.
